languages.text: Курительная субстанция из сушеных листьев растений с высоким содержанием никотина. Аналог древнего человеческого наркотика под названием "табак".
A common form of recreational stimulant that consists of a rolled paper stuffed with a plant-derived substance. When lit, this substance emits smoke that is inhaled through the tube.
languages.original_text: Курительная субстанция из сушеных листьев растений с высоким содержанием никотина. Аналог древнего человеческого наркотика под названием "табак".

traits.locale_text: Smoking substance made from dried plant leaves with a high concentration of nicotine. Its counterpart from ancient human history is a narcotic known as "tobacco."
Smoking substance made from dried plant leaves with a high concentration of nicotine. Its counterpart from ancient human history is a narcotic known as "tobacco."
A smoking substance made from dried plant leaves with a high concentration of nicotine. Its counterpart from ancient human history is a narcotic known as "tobacco."
A smoking substance made from dried plant leaves with a high concentration of nicotine. Its counterpart from ancient human history is a narcotic known as "tobacco."
A common form of recreational stimulant that consists of a rolled paper stuffed with a plant-derived substance. When lit, this substance emits smoke that is inhaled through the tube.

languages.text: Eine weit verbreitete Form einer Entspannungsstimulanz, die aus einem gerollten Papier besteht, das mit einer pflanzlichen Substanz gefüllt ist. Wenn diese Substanz angezündet wird, entsteht Rauch, den man durch das Rohr inhaliert.
languages.original_text: A common form of recreational stimulant that consists of a rolled paper stuffed with a plant-derived substance. When lit, this substance emits smoke that is inhaled through the tube.

traits.locale_text: Eine weit verbreitete Form einer Entspannungsstimulanz, die aus einem gerollten Papier besteht, das mit einer pflanzlichen Substanz gefüllt ist. Wenn diese Substanz angezündet wird, entsteht Rauch, den man durch das Rohr inhaliert.

languages.text: Forme courante de stimulant récréatif constitué d'une substance dérivée d'une plante roulée dans du papier. Lorsqu'elle est allumée, cette substance émet de la fumée qui est inhalée par le tube.
languages.original_text: A common form of recreational stimulant that consists of a rolled paper stuffed with a plant-derived substance. When lit, this substance emits smoke that is inhaled through the tube.

traits.locale_text: Forme courante de stimulant récréatif se composant d'une substance dérivée d'une plante roulée dans du papier. Lorsqu'elle est allumée, cette substance émet de la fumée qui est inhalée par le tube.

languages.text: 常见的娱乐性兴奋剂，外观看起来像是用纸包好的植物提取物。点燃之后，这种提取物会释放出烟雾，可以通过烟管吸入。
languages.original_text: A common form of recreational stimulant that consists of a rolled paper stuffed with a plant-derived substance. When lit, this substance emits smoke that is inhaled through the tube.

traits.locale_text: 常见的娱乐性兴奋剂，外观看起来像是用纸包好的植物提取物。点燃之后，这种提取物会释放出烟雾，可以通过烟管吸入。

languages.text: 植物由来の物質を詰めた紙を丸めたもので、娯楽用興奮剤の一般的な形態。火をつけると煙が出て、筒から吸い込む。
languages.original_text: A common form of recreational stimulant that consists of a rolled paper stuffed with a plant-derived substance. When lit, this substance emits smoke that is inhaled through the tube.

traits.locale_text: 植物由来の物質を詰めた紙を丸めたもので、娯楽用興奮剤の一般的な形態。火をつけると煙が出て、筒から吸い込む。

languages.text: Forma común de estimulante recreativo que consta de un papel enrollado y relleno de una sustancia vegetal. Cuando se enciende, dicho compuesto provoca un humo que se inhala a través del tubo.
languages.original_text: A common form of recreational stimulant that consists of a rolled paper stuffed with a plant-derived substance. When lit, this substance emits smoke that is inhaled through the tube.

traits.locale_text: Forma común de estimulante recreativo que consta de un papel enrollado y relleno de una sustancia vegetal. Cuando se enciende, dicho compuesto provoca un humo que se inhala a través del tubo.

languages.text: Yuvarlanarak silindir hâline getirilmiş bir kâğıdın içine bitkisel bir maddenin doldurulmasıyla elde edilen, keyif veren yaygın bir uyarıcı. Bu madde yakıldığında, tüp aracılığıyla solunan bir duman çıkarır.
languages.original_text: A common form of recreational stimulant that consists of a rolled paper stuffed with a plant-derived substance. When lit, this substance emits smoke that is inhaled through the tube.
